nodes.text: The Camba-Fruit was a species of fruit that grew on Moltok, a rainforest-covered planet that was located in the Atrivis sector of the Outer Rim Territories. Camba-Fruit was used to make the cosmetic product Distilled Water of Moltokian Camba-Fruit, which was designed to prevent the formation of wrinkles. The product was one of several in the catalog of Human scientist Cray Mingla by 12 ABY.
The Camba-Fruit was created by Barbara Hambly in her 1995 novel, Children of the Jedi.
